title: Why do I get a timer, when LOL client crashes?
body: This is yo fault, not mine, dont give me a timer for that crap. {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
If your getting a timer for the queue launch, it's probably because you started the queue than it crashed while it brings up the ready interface before champion select and it registers as an AFK response to the server.

Solution: If the client crash is happening after opening the hextech shop, send a support ticket to riot for the fix.

Regardless of why a disconnection happens, it negatively impacts everyone in the match. This happens to be a reason why the system treats all disconnections as equal and why penalties cannot be removed or modified. 

If you can give me a more detailed description of exactly where the client crashes and any error messages you see, I can provide the right steps to resolve this.
